name: DarkWeb-Checker
description: Search breach forums, marketplaces, and dark web sources for stolen PI â€” and collect evidence to support claims that an organization acquired or used stolen data.

skills.name: Scan Dark Web
skills.description: Searches breach forums, marketplaces, and dark web sources for stolen personal information.
examples: Search for email in breach dump
Check if phone number appears in dark web dataset

skills.name: Trace Data Origins
skills.description: Analyzes stolen data to infer which organization may have leaked or sold the information.
examples: Identify likely source of stolen data
Match dataset structure to known vendor

skills.name: Collect Dark Web Evidence
skills.description: Captures structured evidence of stolen PI to support complaints, deletion requests, or regulatory escalation.

x-tasks.description: Validate an artifact and produce a compliance-grade validation report.
Publish a signed evidence manifest for downstream agents.

x-tools.name: http.get
x-tools.description: Performs authenticated GET requests to fetch external resources.

x-tools.name: crypto.sign
x-tools.description: Signs payloads using the agent's internal key material.

x-messages.description: Emitted when an artifact has been validated.
Emitted when an evidence manifest is published.

x-artifacts.description: A cryptographically signed manifest describing evidence, lineage, and provenance.
A compliance-grade validation report for artifacts.
